bug.author: lcy-seso
bug.summary: Latex equation of fluid fc layer is not correctly rendered.
bug.description:
I update the documentation of fluid fc layer, and found the Latex equation is not correctly rendered. My codes are as follows: <denchmark-code> This process can be formulated as follows:
.. math::
Out = Act \left({\sum_{i=0}^{N-1}W_iX_i + b}\right) </denchmark-code>
The html looks like this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5842774/34284363-3c6bfc92-e70c-11e7-8767-ff6a6da686ee.png></denchmark-link>
It seems that the escape character \ is removed? I just replace \left( and \right) with ( and ) to fix this.
